author: mariusvanderwijden
content:
You want to increase gas cost: show that an opcode is underpriced
You want do decrease gas cost: show that an opcode is overrpriced compared to all others and there are no dos vectors
Repricings are done via a hardfork

author: bridge-bot
content: <timbeiko> EIP-2565, even though it is for a precompile and not an opcode, is a good example.
